name: HOTEL DU LOUVRE
description:
Conveniently situated in Casablanca, HOTEL DU LOUVRE provides air-conditioned rooms with free private parking and room service. This 1-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Hassan II Mosq is 3.9 km from the hotel and Anfa Place Living Resort is 4.9 km away.

At the hotel, each room comes with a balcony. Guest rooms in HOTEL DU LOUVRE are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Central Market of Casablanca, Arab League Park and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International, 28 km from HOTEL DU LOUVRE, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel de paris
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel de paris! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Set in Casablanca, 6 km from Hassan II Mosq, Hotel de paris features a shared lounge and views of the city. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at Hotel de paris have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a terrace.


Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast.

Anfa Place Living Resort is 8 km from Hotel de paris, while Morocco Mall is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International, 22 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Majestic
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Majestic! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Set in Casablanca, 2.6 km from Hassan II Mosq, Hotel Majestic features free WiFi access and free private parking.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room has a private bathroom.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

Anfa Place Living Resort is 5 km from Hotel Majestic, while Ain Diab Corniche is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International Airport, 24 km from Hotel Majestic.

name: Hôtel Transatlantique
description:
A 17-minute walk from Bab Marrakesh souks, this hotel proposes a piano bar, 2 restaurants and an Oriental cabaret. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi a 14-minute walk from Casa Port Train Station.

Each room has an en suite bathroom with bathtub and bathrobe. All include a TV with satellite channels and some have a balcony. All feature elements of traditional Moroccan decoration.

A buffet breakfast is provided in the morning. For other meals you can choose between 2 restaurants offering international and Moroccan specialties.

Hôtel Transatlantique is located 3 km from Casa Voyageur Train Station and 35 km from Mohamed V Airport. Casablanca Morocco Mall is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Astrid
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hôtel Astrid! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Hôtel Astrid is located in Casablanca, 2 km from the train station and 7 km from the port. The hotel is traditionally decorated and offers free Wi-Fi internet access in public areas.

The guest rooms at Hôtel Astrid include a TV, a telephone and a seating area. Each room also has a private bathroom with a bathtub.

Moroccan dishes can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant and a continental breakfast is prepared every morning. Luggage storage is available and the hotel features a 24-hour reception.

Hassan II Mosque is 10 km away and Mohammed V International Airport is reached by car in 25 minutes. There is a shopping centre located just 3 km from the property.

name: Appartement Néoclassique centre-ville
description:
Appartement Néoclassique centre-ville provides accommodation located 700 metres from the centre of Casablanca and offers a terrace and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 4.1 km from Hassan II Mosq.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

You can play billiards and table tennis at the apartment. A bowling alley is also available for guests at Appartement Néoclassique centre-ville.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Central Market of Casablanca, Arab League Park and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International Airport, 28 km from Appartement Néoclassique centre-ville.

name: Hôtel Amouday
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hôtel Amouday! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Hotel Amoud is located in the heart of Casablanca, near the medina and the Place Mohamed V. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV.

The Amoud has a 24-hour reception and offers a laundry and valet service.

Private parking is available at Hotel Amoud, as well as an airport transfer service.

name: Dar mektoube
description:
Situated in Casablanca, 5 km from Anfa Place Living Resort and 10 km from Morocco Mall, Dar mektoube offers air conditioning. The property is around 1.1 km from Casa Port Railway Terminal, 1.5 km from Ancient Medina of Casablanca and 3.7 km from Casa Voyageurs Train Station. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 3.9 km from Hassan II Mosq.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Central Market of Casablanca, Arab League Park and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International Airport, 28 km from Dar mektoube.

name: One Hotel Casablanca
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at One Hotel Casablanca! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at One Hotel CasablancaSituated in Casablanca and with Hassan II Mosq reachable within 4.1 km, One Hotel Casablanca features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers an ATM. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At One Hotel Casablanca rooms have bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near One Hotel Casablanca include Central Market of Casablanca, Arab League Park and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International, 28 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ennesma Hotel
description:
Situated in the Sidi Belyout district in Casablanca, Ennesma Hotel offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 6 km from Anfa Place Living Resort, 11 km from Morocco Mall and 1.6 km from Casa Port Railway Terminal. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 4.6 km from Hassan II Mosq.

Speaking Arabic, English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Arab League Park, Central Market of Casablanca and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International, 28 km from Ennesma Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
